assignment_info.title: Homework 2: Data Cleaning - Handling Missing Values and Outliers
learning_objectives: Identify and quantify missing values in datasets
Apply appropriate missing value treatment strategies (removal vs. imputation)
Detect outliers using statistical methods (IQR, boxplots)
Compare different data cleaning approaches and their business implications
key_skills: Missing value treatment (mean imputation, mode imputation)

data_import_assessment.description: Successful data import and initial assessment

excellent.description: Successfully imports messy dataset, correctly identifies dimensions, displays structure and summary statistics

good.description: Imports data with minor issues, basic assessment completed

satisfactory.description: Data imported but assessment incomplete or contains errors

needs_improvement.description: Failed to import data or major errors in assessment

missing_value_identification.description: Accurate identification and quantification of missing values

excellent.description: Correctly calculates total missing values, missing per column, and incomplete rows using appropriate R functions

good.description: Most missing value calculations correct with minor errors

satisfactory.description: Basic missing value identification completed but some calculations incorrect

needs_improvement.description: Failed to properly identify missing values or major calculation errors

missing_value_treatment.description: Implementation of both removal and imputation strategies

excellent.description: Successfully implements both removal and imputation approaches, creates mode function, applies appropriate imputation methods

good.description: Both approaches implemented with minor issues in execution

satisfactory.description: One approach fully implemented, other partially completed

needs_improvement.description: Failed to implement missing value treatment strategies properly

automated_checks: No missing values remain after imputation

outlier_detection.description: Statistical outlier detection using IQR method

excellent.description: Correctly calculates quartiles, IQR, thresholds, and identifies outliers using statistical methods

good.description: Most outlier detection steps correct with minor calculation errors

satisfactory.description: Basic outlier detection implemented but some steps incorrect

needs_improvement.description: Failed to properly implement IQR outlier detection method

automated_checks: Q1_sales and Q3_sales correctly calculated using quantile()
Outliers correctly identified using threshold conditions

outlier_treatment.description: Implementation of outlier removal and capping strategies

excellent.description: Successfully implements both removal and capping approaches with correct logic

good.description: Both approaches implemented with minor issues

satisfactory.description: One approach fully implemented, other partially completed

needs_improvement.description: Failed to implement outlier treatment strategies

automated_checks: sales_outliers_removed created using filter() or subset()
Capping correctly applied to extreme values

methodology_justification.description: Quality of reasoning for chosen cleaning approaches and final dataset selection

excellent.description: Provides clear, well-reasoned justification for cleaning decisions with strong business context and consideration of trade-offs

good.description: Good justification with some business context, minor gaps in reasoning

satisfactory.description: Basic justification provided but lacks depth or business context

needs_improvement.description: Poor or missing justification, no clear reasoning for decisions

evaluation_criteria: Clear rationale for final dataset choice
Consideration of sample size vs. data quality trade-offs
Understanding of when to use different approaches

reflection_questions.description: Understanding of business implications and ethical considerations

excellent.description: Demonstrates deep understanding of business implications, provides specific examples, addresses ethical considerations thoughtfully

good.description: Good understanding with some specific examples, addresses most questions adequately

satisfactory.description: Basic understanding demonstrated, answers are generic or lack depth

needs_improvement.description: Poor understanding, missing answers, or incorrect responses

questions_assessed: Missing value strategy scenarios with specific business examples
Outlier interpretation and treatment in business context
Impact on business analytics tasks (averages, forecasting, etc.)

code_documentation.description: Clear explanation of cleaning decisions and code quality

excellent.description: Code is well-documented, cleaning decisions clearly explained, professional presentation

good.description: Good documentation with minor gaps in explanation

satisfactory.description: Basic documentation, some cleaning decisions explained

needs_improvement.description: Poor or missing documentation, unclear explanations

evaluation_criteria: Comparison summary is complete and accurate

data_structures.test: messy_sales dataset exists and has correct dimensions

data_structures.expected: Fewer rows than original, no missing values
Same rows as original, no missing values
Same rows as imputed, values within thresholds

function_implementations.expected: Returns most frequent value, handles NA values
Q1, Q3, IQR, thresholds mathematically correct

required_elements: All TODO sections completed with working code
Student name and date filled in header
All cells executed with visible output
Final dataset choice clearly indicated and justified

syntax_errors.description: Code contains syntax errors that prevent execution

incomplete_todo_sections.description: Per TODO section left incomplete or with placeholder code

missing_justification.description: No justification provided for final dataset choice

incorrect_statistical_methods.description: Incorrect implementation of IQR method or imputation

missing_reflection_answers.description: Per reflection question left unanswered or inadequately addressed

poor_code_organization.description: Code is disorganized, lacks comments, or difficult to follow

advanced_visualization.description: Creates additional visualizations beyond required boxplot

sensitivity_analysis.description: Tests multiple outlier detection thresholds and compares results

business_case_study.description: Provides detailed real-world business scenario analysis
